@TrisidiaX wrote:

The Soul:

lol? what is there to explain? its coding that rsweb clients uses only thing i changed is the interfaces thats all i changed. the coding is to show the lvl xp and the level “which is alreay in the soruce” just a change of the interfaces

item.title: How to fix 99 Glitch on RsWebclients
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

How to fix The 99 in all lvl glitch on RsWebclients:
In PlayerAssissant.java look for:

Replace that whole void with this

public void refreshSkill(int i) {
		switch (i) {
			case 0:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[0] + "", 7159);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + "", 7160);
			
			break;
			
			case 1:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[1] + "", 7163);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + "", 7164);
			
			break;
			
			case 2:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 7161);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + "", 7162);
			
			break;
			
			case 3:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[3] + "", 7175);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + "", 7176);
			
			break;
			
			case 4:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[4] + "", 7165);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + "", 7166);
			
			break;
			//7159 7163 7161 7175 7165 7167 7169 7197 7201 7185 7195 7199 7183 7193 7191 7179 7177 7181 7187 7203 7171 7173 7189 7205 7157
			case 5:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[5] + "", 7167);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + "", 7168);
		
			sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])+"", 687);//Prayer frame
			break;
			
			case 6:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[6] + "", 7169);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + "", 7170);
		
			break;
			
			case 7:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[7] + "", 7197);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + "", 7198);

			break;
			
			case 8:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[8] + "", 7201);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + "", 7202);

			break;
			
			case 9:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[9] + "", 7185);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + "", 7186);

			break;
			
			case 10:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[10] + "", 7195);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + "", 7196);
	
			break;
			
			case 11:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[11] + "", 7199);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + "", 7200);
			
			break;
			
			case 12:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[12] + "", 7183);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + "", 7184);
		
			break;
			
			case 13:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[13] + "", 7193);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + "", 7194);
		
			break;
			
			case 14:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[14] + "", 7191);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + "", 7192);
		
			break;
			
			case 15:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[15] + "", 7179);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + "", 7180);
		
			break;
			//7177 7181 7187 7203 7171 7173 7189 7205 7157
			case 16:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[16] + "", 7177);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + "", 7178);
		
			break;
			
			case 17:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[17] + "", 7181);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + "", 7182);
			
			break;
			
			case 18:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[18] + "", 7187);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + "", 7188);
		
			break;
			
			case 19:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[19] + "", 7203);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + "", 7204);
			
			break;
			
			case 20:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[20] + "", 7171);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) + "", 7172);
			break;
		
			case 21:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[21] + "", 7173);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[21]) + "", 7174);
			
			break;
			
			case 22:

			break;
			
			case 23:
			sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[23] + "", 7205);
			sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[23]) + "", 7206);
			
			break;
			
			case 24:
if(c.playerXP[24] >= 0 && c.playerXP[24] <= 14391160) { 
sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[24] + "", 7157);
sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[24]) + "", 7158);
  } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 14391161 && c.playerXP[24] <= 15889108) {
    sendFrame126("100", 7157);
	sendFrame126("100", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 15889109 && c.playerXP[24] <= 17542976) {
    sendFrame126("101", 7157);
    sendFrame126("101", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 17542977 && c.playerXP[24] <= 19368991) {
    sendFrame126("102", 7157);

 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 19368992 && c.playerXP[24] <= 21385072) {

 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 21385073 && c.playerXP[24] <= 23611005) {
    sendFrame126("104", 7157);
    sendFrame126("104", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 23611006 && c.playerXP[24] <= 26068631) {
    sendFrame126("105", 7157);
    sendFrame126("105", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 26068632 && c.playerXP[24] <= 28782068) {
    sendFrame126("106", 7157);
    sendFrame126("106", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 28782069 && c.playerXP[24] <= 31777942) {
    sendFrame126("107", 7157);
    sendFrame126("107", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 31777943 && c.playerXP[24] <= 35085653) {
    sendFrame126("108", 7157);
    sendFrame126("108", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 35085654 && c.playerXP[24] <= 38737660) {
    sendFrame126("109", 7157);
    sendFrame126("109", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 38737661 && c.playerXP[24] <= 42769799) {
    sendFrame126("110", 7157);
    sendFrame126("110", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 42769800 && c.playerXP[24] <= 47221639) {
    sendFrame126("111", 7157);
    sendFrame126("111", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 47221640 && c.playerXP[24] <= 52136868) {
    sendFrame126("112", 7157);
    sendFrame126("112", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 52136869 && c.playerXP[24] <= 57563717) {
    sendFrame126("113", 7157);
    sendFrame126("113", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 57563718 && c.playerXP[24] <= 63555442) {
    sendFrame126("114", 7157);
    sendFrame126("114", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 63555443 && c.playerXP[24] <= 70170839) {
    sendFrame126("115", 7157);
    sendFrame126("115", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 70170840 && c.playerXP[24] <= 77474827) {
    sendFrame126("116", 7157);
    sendFrame126("116", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 77474828 && c.playerXP[24] <= 85539081) {
    sendFrame126("117", 7157);
    sendFrame126("117", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 85539082 && c.playerXP[24] <= 94442735) {
    sendFrame126("118", 7157);
    sendFrame126("118", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 94442736 && c.playerXP[24] <= 104273166) {
    sendFrame126("119", 7157);
    sendFrame126("119", 7158);
 } else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 104273167 && c.playerXP[24] <= 210000000) {
    sendFrame126("120", 7157);
    sendFrame126("120", 7158);
 }
 break;
 }
 }

This coding changed Absolutely nothing! all it changed was the interfaces at the end to match with RsWebclients interfaces. thats the reason why its glitched becsue the 2 interfaces are diffrent

Now go into Clickingbuttons.java and look for:

under there you should see something like my slayer level is …

Now from that case on to dung replace that coding with this:

case 27209:			
			c.forcedText = "[QC] My Slayer level is  " + c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + ".";
			c.sendMessage("I must slay another " + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask));
			c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
			c.updateRequired = true;
			break;
			
	case 27211:
		c.forcedText = "[QC] My Hunter level is  " + c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[21]) + ".";
		c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
		c.updateRequired = true;
	break;
	case 27190:
		c.forcedText = "[QC] My Attack level is  " + c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + ".";

	break;

	if(c.playerXP[24] >= 0 && c.playerXP[24] <= 14391160) {
		c.forcedText = "[QC] My Dungeoneering level is  " + c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[24]) + ".";

} else if(c.playerXP[24] >= 14391161 && c.playerXP[24] <= 15889108) {

		}

And there you have it!
